@graph.name: Stocking Advisor Prototype
@graph.description: Preview the Stocking Advisor prototype to model freshwater fish communities, rehearse compatibility, and tune bioload decisions before publishing to the live experience.

@graph.name: Stocking Advisor
@graph.description: A freshwater aquarium stocking planner that balances bioload, compatibility, and parameter targets before livestock purchases.

mainEntity.name: How does the prototype handle cycle readiness guidance?

acceptedAnswer.text: It assumes a conservative cycle and highlights stocking ranges that protect against ammonia spikes, encouraging keepers to stagger additions and test water chemistry weekly.

mainEntity.name: Can I compare different community presets in one session?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. The prototype caches your current mix, letting you duplicate, rename, and iterate on scenarios so you can evaluate stocking density before pushing updates live.

mainEntity.name: What data powers the compatibility alerts?

acceptedAnswer.text: Gemini synthesizes our catalog of species records, tagging each fish with temperament, adult size, and parameter tolerances to surface conflicts the moment they appear in a plan.

mainEntity.name: How should I report feedback on the prototype results?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use the built-in send-feedback link in the results panel or drop a note in the #stocking-advisor Slack channel so the product team can review logs and reproduce the scenario.
